//to prepare
npm install
// In case of problem
Reinstall node and re-launch npm install - node 0.12 works with both Syracuse and build
// Set the proxy
'config list' to list the congig
'config set proxy http://proxysage:8080' to set the proxy
// Add node js path in  'path' environment variable - C:\Program Files\nodejs\
// Install grunt client
grunt -cli -g

// to build css only 
grunt css

// to build css + dev tools bootstrap/font_awesome
grunt

// to build all - css + dev tools + js min + manifest
grunt release

// to build winjs
grunt winjs
